nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.renderer.panel

Class InfoPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.renderer.panel.InfoPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class InfoPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Contains all information about the player and game, for example it contains and displays the current level the player is on, how much time is left on a level, how many chips are left to collect, and what is in the players inventory.
    Author:
    Tim - Creator, Mike - Contributor
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
